programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 13 USC wraps up its two-game homestand by hosting Utah at Memorial Coliseum. The Trojans bounced back from their first loss of the season with a 38-10 victory over Oregon State. Meanwhile, Utah took its first loss of the year, 23-20 to Stanford.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Two Mountain West teams meet as the 4-2 Rams return home to play host to the 1-5 Wolf Pack in Week 7. Colorado State is 7-3 over the last 10 games against Nevada, however, the Wolf Pack won the Nova Home Loans Arizona Bowl in 2015 28-23.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: The No. 11 Hurricanes (4-0) host the Yellow Jackets (3-1). Miami remained undefeated with a 24-20 Florida Cup victory over Florida State. The all-time series is tied at 11 wins apiece, but the Hurricanes have won seven of the last eight contests.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: An all-SEC matchup has the Razorbacks on the road against the Volunteers. Last week, South Carolina scored double-digit points in three of the four quarters en route to a 48-22 win over Arkansas. Conversely, Tennessee lost to No. 4 Georgia 41-0.
